body.name: Broom and Dustpan Set for Home, 36" Broom Dust Pan Set for Teen, Broom with Dustpan Combo Set for Home Kitchen Room Office Outdoor Indoor - 3L Capacity, 10" Great Edge

features: 【MINI Size】The broom with dustpan combo set is 36inches tall, thoughtful design for people under 5FT. Package inculding 1 x Broom, 1 x Dustpan.

【36inches Broom Set】The broom and dustpan are each equipped with 2 poles. The total height of the broom is 36 inches and the dustpan is 33 inches, and you can even assemble just ONE pole for them if you need.

【Upgraded Broom】Newly upgraded four-row bristles design. The broom and dustpan set is made of PP, stainless steel, and the broom is equipped with soft bristles. Our broom set makes cleaning easy and enjoyable!

【Large Capacity Dustpan】The dustpan has a large capacity, which prevent garbage and dusty from dropping. Plus, you can put the cute broom on the dustpan with handle clip, easy to store and save space. Allows you hanging or upright the broom dustpan set to store.
【Widely Used】The dustpan broom set can be used in many places, such as home, office, kitchen, lobby, garage, garden, indoor and outdoor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The kitchen broom and dustpan set is made of pp and stainless steel, durable. Easy to put together and Store. Allows you hanging or upright the broom dustpan set to store. The dustpan has a large capacity that can hold a lot of garbage and prevent garbage from spilling.

FGY Broom and Dustpan Set Our broom with dustpan combo set is widely used, not only can be used for kitchen cleaning, carpet sweep, floor cleaning, hair cleaning and so on, but also can be used in kitchen, room, office, lobby, garage, garden, indoors and outdoors.

FGY broom and dustpan set is available in 2 sizes: 36inch and 48inch. For the 36" broom dustpan set, we have specially prepared it for people under 5FT, which eliminates the need for customers to buy a broom that is too tall and not suitable for use. The 48" broom with dustpan set is suitable for all people, especially those over 5FT. In addition, we have multiple colors to choose from to meet your needs. We hope that our intentions will be recognized by you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: It was a little bit short handled for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I enjoy using this product. It makes my life a little easier to clean up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dust pan
reviews.reviewText: I wish I would have ordered the longer broom but the dust pan & broom are sturdy & I like the color. Also it has a rake on the bottom of the dust pan to rake the broom & I don’t have to use my hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I should have read the description, so it’s on me, but this thing is so short… It’s cute, seems like a solid broom, but it’s just so small lol. Size is in item description though, so again it’s my lack of reading comprehension skills that got me this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not catch debris
reviews.reviewText: I like the idea of sweeping as you go, and I like the color of the broom. However the dustpan duo does not serve the purpose of purchase. The small trash goes right underneath the the dustpan, requiring multiple attempts to get the trash in, or having to maneuver the dustpan so that it lays on the floor properly. Even with leaning the dustpan forward, it doesn’t catch the trash. The height of the broom and dustpan which I thought would be somewhat adjustable is not good for long term use or heavy jobs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Like A Charm
reviews.reviewText: What a nice broom and dustpan this is. It works well and is lightweight and easy to use. I may have to get another one for the garage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its very short I'm only 5'5 and I have to constantly bend over the entire time I sweep, which is very uncomfortable! For how small it is the price should be around $7. This would be a great present for a child who loves to clean, not for an actual broom and dustpan that you would use daily. Very disappointing. It seems to sweep and pick up okay....not the best and not the worst but its just wayyy to short.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice set for small space
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for dorm style apartment and it works great. It’s used by 4 people and is still doing its job. It also tucks away in the closet nicely so it’s not constantly in the way.
